definition: fully deserving, without any reservations (idiom); entirely worthy (of a title, honor etc)
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: A:I think he deserved his gold.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他的金牌當之無愧。

sentences.english: I wish you every success in the future, You are worthysuccess.
sentences.chinese: 我祝你來日事業成功，出類拔萃，成功當之無愧。

sentences.english: And thus Stieglitz deservingly gained the reputation as the "Father of the Contemporary Photography".
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂格利茨也被當之無愧地譽爲“當代攝影之父”。

sentences.english: Rembrandt is a deservedly famous artist .
sentences.chinese: 倫勃朗是個當之無愧的名畫家。

sentences.english: The leader on and off the court.
sentences.chinese: 場上或場下都是當之無愧的領袖。

sentences.english: It's worth the Grammy Award it won.
sentences.chinese: 它得了格萊美獎真當之無愧啊。

sentences.english: She deserved it, because she played Paganini better than anyone else in the world.
sentences.chinese: 她當之無愧，因爲她拉的帕格尼尼是世界第一。

sentences.english: Guo Moruo is a well-deserved founder of Chinese New Poetry.
sentences.chinese: 郭沫若當之無愧是中國新詩的奠基者。

sentences.english: He is the true father of this century's best art.
sentences.chinese: 他確實是本世紀的當之無愧的藝術之父。

sentences.english: I wish you every success in the future, You are worthy success.
sentences.chinese: 我祝你來日事業成功，超羣絕倫，成功當之無愧。

sentences.english: He was the first person who advocated Tu Fu in Song dynasty.
sentences.chinese: “兩宋尊杜第一人”，王禹是當之無愧的。

sentences.english: They went to their death unflinchingly, worthy of the title of heroes.
sentences.chinese: 慷慨赴死，從容就義，他們當之無愧。

sentences.english: These, it is dry to one company come out , be be worthy of.
sentences.chinese: 這些，對一公司來說是幹出來的，是當之無愧的。

sentences.english: She worked hard all year. She really deserved the honor.
sentences.chinese: 她一整年辛勤工作，這份榮譽她當之無愧。

sentences.english: Pavel Anosov received well-deserved recognition for his achievements.
sentences.chinese: 帕維爾阿諾索夫的成就收到當之無愧的認可。

sentences.english: "Captain Tsubasa" Japan eyes of the public well-deserved hero.
sentences.chinese: 《足球小將》是日本民衆心目中當之無愧的英雄。
